bike.description: M5 alloy, fully manipulated frame w/ ORE TT/ DT, tapered and forged HT, ISCG mount, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 160mm travel

components.description: Fox RP23-S with Boost Valve, reb and separate climbing setting and custom 3-position low-speed comp adj., 8.5 x 2.125"
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized Command Post, 3 position, 125mm adjustable height w/air spring, remote operated, single bolt head
34.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
